events.name: Startup Funding in Saint Petersburg: How to Raise Money for Your Business
events.description: Do you have startup that needs funding Do you want to learn how startup funding works what you need to do before trying to raise funding and where you can go to get it Then join us for this Saint Petersburg fundraising workshop which will provide practical step by step advice It will feature talks from entrepreneurs who have successfully raised money for their businesses and investors actively funding businesses Learn expert tips big pitfalls to avoid what investors are looking for how equity works and more     Speakers include  Igor Kudinov CFO VeeRoute  Anton Gopka General Partner ATEM Capital     Who Should Attend  Anyone who is thinking about raising money for their startup  Anyone that wants an understanding of fundraising for early stage businesses and products    What are some of the Topics  The key metrics and pre-requisites for raising funding and the anatomy of fundable company  How to make yourself more attractive to investors  How to utilize online fundraising networks and platforms like AngelList Gust Kicksta r and Indiegogo  How to meet and work with different sources of capital such as friends and family angel investors venture capitalists government grants and loans and more  and more      This event is FREE and we expect over  people in attendance Please RSVP here    linkified     For information about the investors incubators and tech events available see our list of Startup Resources    linkified Interested in perfecting your pitch Read our Pitch Deck Guide    linkified and download templates     This event is sponsored by the Founder Institute startup accelerator Founder Institute provides step-by-step program that gives startup founders the structure mentor support and network of entrepreneurs they need to start an enduring company Based in Silicon Valley and with chapters across  countries the Founder Institute's mission is to Globalize Silicon Valley and build sustainable startup ecosystems worldwide  If you have any feedback on this event please let us know at    linkified  Also remember to sign up for our Founder Insight mailing list to receive exclusive startup training videos and articles every Monday and Thursday    linkified

events.description: Hey Are you the person who have learnt English but don‚Äôt have enough practice Or you‚Äôre foreigner and still don't understand these strange Russians    We know what you need You need REAL TALK  REAL TALK club is group of young enthusiastic open-minded and ENGLISH-SPEAKING guys We meet weekly discuss plenty of topics in pairs than play different games in English  On our meetings you can   increase your skill in English and learn to speak fluently   meet new people find friends and adherents not only Russian  we are often visited by foreigners and native speakers   discuss everything you are interested in   spend evening in warm friendly atmosphere  If your English level is INTERMEDIATE UPPER-INTERMEDIATE and ADVANCED these meetings are for you   every Monday   p.m Moscow Zubovskiy blvd   b   Vabi-Sabi  rd floor   every Wednesday   p.m Moscow Balchug   Starbucks  nd floor   every Friday   p.m Moscow Kuznetsky most    Starbucks   every Sunday   p.m Moscow Dolgorukovskaya     Coffee Bean  Also we make special event for those who only begin to practice English PRE-INTERMEDIATE level  Every Sunday Native teacher from Canada is waiting for you at   p.m on Coffee Bean Dolgorukovskaya     Also he is waiting for you every Friday at   on Coffee Bean Dolgorukovskaya      And we have special SPANISH meeting Every Wednesday at   p.m we meet in Starbucks Stremyanny per   to pracise Spanish language Fee is  rubles  What should you do to join us It‚Äôs very easy Just look through our schedule find the meeting you like and come   Fee for Monday Tuesday Thursday Friday    and Sunday    meetings is  rub it is absolutely free for foreigners   Fee for PRE-INTERMEDIATE Friday   and Sunday    with the native teacher is  rub  with membership  You can bother Anthony he is always ready to help    masked

events.name: #5: David West in Moscow
events.description: David West will visit Moscow to explain to us what Object-Oriented Programming is and why it's dead  More information to be published soon Stay tuned  Dave West PhD has been professional software developer since  the year that Software Engineering first became profession He was an early adopter of objects and established the Object Lab at the University of St Thomas in St Paul Minnesota in  He is the author of Object Thinking and Design Thinking with third book Natural Systems Design due in the spring of  He currently lives in Amsterdam NL where he is founding partner of Object Guild BV custom software development company Dave also had distinguished career in academia including the establishment of an award-winning software development apprenticeship program Like Alan Kay inventor of the term Object-Oriented Programming  Dave believes the full potential of objects has yet to be realized

events.description: Link to FB    linkified  Entrance  roubles cash at the door  welcome drink included Password INTERNATIONAL FC/DC light     strict      This year our traditional Pre-NYE party will be held for the first time at Soho Rooms In  our international community became much bigger and we introduced many new venues and events so we decided to keep the most  y and exclusive one for the last event of the year It will be wonderful opportunity to meet all together to say goodbye to those leaving for holidays or for those staying in Moscow to plan how to spend NYE together  Definitely something not to miss   Party plan there will be for our MIE group lighter FC/DC dress code formal long sleeves shirts  ic shoes no sport shoes/clothes from   till   and strict from   till   The entrance fee with the password INTERNATIONAL will be just  rub per person from   to   and it will include compliment from the bar  The plan is to gather first at the bar of Soho Rooms from   socialize get acquainted practice languages in  y and exclusive environment with the usual positive and friendly atmosphere that characterizes all of our MIE events The pool terrace will open at   and that's the place that will host both the dance area and the show while we'll keep the bar area downstairs for us for the whole night as chill-out area  Our password will work just till   but you're strongly advised to come starting from   and not later than   to get advantage of the light Face/Dress control agreement with the club  After the entrance you'll be welcomed by the hostess say to her the password pay cash for the entrance ticket and you'll be given MIE wristband free drink card and shown how to find our group We'll gather around the bar and then on the pool terrace For booking tables contact us    linkified  Don't even think to miss the International VIP be international be smart have fun with the best people the whole night

events.name: Practice Russian. –ì–û–í–û–†–ò–ú –ü–û –†–£–°–°–ö–ò.
events.description: Hello If you're foreigner living in Moscow Expat in Russia or just visitor on vacation and you want to communicate learn or practice Russian language in an atmosphere dedicated to that please join If you want to understand Russians have conversation with us have some cultural clues or investigate our mistirious souls  get aboard  Six speaking Clubs Russian English Chinese Spanish German and French are going on almost simultaneously so once you are tired you may jump over to your native tongue or the one that seems easier and/or you want to practice Each group speaks separetely but depending on level may switch to any convinient tongue  we try to create an immitation of language environment  Moreover special announcement has been made on friendly Russian resources thus we host bunch of Russian young people permamently joining the event and would be more than eager to communicate with you in either tongue To keep it better for your Russian skills we've set glossary of words to use at the event     linkified  For practicing languages we will introduce each other discuss topics and play games If you are new to the Russian language  bring dictionary and notebook with you to make it listenning   of your own  The cost is  rubles per person per hour payed at the caffee Communication jumps are free   Directions to Sturbucks cafe Since Frunzenskaya metro station is temporarily closed for renovation one has to take FREE bus M (frequency is min/bus from Park Kultury metro station As you come out turn right and follow the sidewalk till you see bus stop Ride till Frunzenskaya stop and upon exit go straight to the huge building The cafe is on the right corner If you will have troubles  call Alexnader   masked or follow the map         embedded

events.description: GET FEEDBACK GAIN CONFIDENCE GET READY  The ability to pitch and communicate your project effectively is critical for any startup founder on the path of getting Clients Team Members and Investors  This is your unique opportunity to refine your idea and message based on honest advice from dozens of event participants and expert mentors from variety of industries This pitching event is shared on dozens of communities globally and have an average attendance of more than  entrepreneurs come join us  Not ready to pitch Join as listener to hear other pitches and give feedback that will help them get to the next level         Mark your attendance here top-right of the page  then sign up using this link spaces are limited    linkified    Are you busy at this time You can also register for an additional event hours later        Pitching your startup  Practice your pitch to gain confidence and improve your public speaking skills  After your pitch the mentors will give feedback and dozens of participants in the chat will also share their comments  Selected pitchers will be featured in our blog social media and our newsletter reaching tens of thousands of people   Not ready to pitch  Join as viewer Get inspired by other projects share your feedback and expand your horizons while watching other people pitch  Connect to other startup founders from around the world in our interactive chat      We would like to take this opportunity to tell you about an amazing offer from our partners at WeWork StartupBlink members can now schedule free tour at WeWork Coworking spaces and get up to  discount Register    linkified      Are you on Telegram Keep in touch with thousands of entrepreneurs from around the world at    linkified

events.name: English Movie club
events.description: LCampus is an international society where you can socialize network practice languages and make new friends from all over the world  We have bunch of activities and English Movie Club is one of them When you learn English with movies you are learning the real English used by native speakers Films provide you with examples of English used in real situations outside the  room particularly interactive language  the language of real-life conversation Movies will expose you to natural expressions and the natural flow of speech you‚Äôll hear natural pronunciation everyday vocabulary spoken grammar common idioms and slang Even better you will learn these from interesting and emotional stories  How it works  we discuss phrasal Verbs/Idioms/Expressions/Slang from movie with native English speaker  watch movie all together  discuss emotions characters and plot after watching movie  Intermediate level or higher is recommended   Click Going button to be notified when the selected movie will be announced in the comments   When every Tuesday at  Duration  h Address Bar SPB metro Mendeleevskays exit  Suschevskaya      linkified Foreigners fee Donation  –°—Ç–æ–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä—É–± –¥–ª—è —Ç–æ–≥–æ —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏—Ç—å  —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫—É –Ω–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–µ –ø–æ—Å–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∏–π—Ç–∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–º –∏–ª–∏ üìç–ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∞–Ω–æ–Ω—Å—ã    linkified –±–ª–∏–∂–∞–π—à–∏–π –∞–Ω–æ–Ω—Å    linkified –∏ –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥–µ –∑–∞—Ä–µ–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –ø–æ —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ –Ω–∏–∂–µ  Respect the cafeteria that host us by making any order moreover there is  discount for all menu till There is dress code in the bar you need to be dressed just fine  and everyone should have passport or any ID  Register please we'll send you film materials for discussion    linkified  Join our international chat LCampus.ru/chat

events.description: Link to FB event    linkified  This year we'll celebrate Christmas in European Style It's not secret that this is family holiday and our MIE family will celebrate it at its best last Friday before Christmas in order to invite all people expats and locals before they leave to celebrate it with their families To make it happen we chose the Christmas fully decorated Penta Hotel Lounge Bar after the success of our first event there also because Penta is german company fitting the concept of european Christmas we want for this event  If you forgot what PentaParty is here are the keypoints   Excellent location central  y comfortable beautiful  International meet-up multicultural guests start at     Exclusive venue couches billiard playstation bar/restaurant  PartyTime and dance area with an international DJ from    All-in-one meet-up chill-out dance in place ALL for our group  We'll start at   straight after work and we'll have our meet-up chat  get acquainted program FREE entrance with the password INTERNATIONAL how to join Simple get to New Arbat  take the elevator to get to the Third Floor of PentaHotel the PentaLounge  Once there outside the elevator say the password and get the MIE wristband for special offers drinks and food for our guests and enjoy the friendly relaxed atmosphere to make new friends socialize and enjoy great Friday night together  As mentioned the event is totally free the place is reserved for our group and we have program starting from   till late night Both relax and fun beautiful view to the city   and everything made our events must in Moscow friendly international atmosphere  For further info about the event check MIE  Moscow International Events page    linkified we'll provide more details closer to the event Be sure to join to be in the guest list  See you on Friday

events.name: English Movie club
events.description: LCampus is an international society where you can socialize network practice languages and make new friends from all over the world  We have bunch of activities and English Movie Club is one of them When you learn English with movies you are learning the real English used by native speakers Films provide you with examples of English used in real situations outside the  room particularly interactive language  the language of real-life conversation Movies will expose you to natural expressions and the natural flow of speech you‚Äôll hear natural pronunciation everyday vocabulary spoken grammar common idioms and slang Even better you will learn these from interesting and emotional stories  How it works  we discuss phrasal Verbs/Idioms/Expressions/Slang from movie with native English speaker  watch movie all together  discuss emotions characters and plot after watching movie  Intermediate level or higher is recommended   Click Going button to be notified when the selected movie will be announced in the comments   When every Tuesday at  Duration  h Address Bar SPB metro Mendeleevskays exit  Suschevskaya      linkified Foreigners fee Donation  –°—Ç–æ–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä—É–± –¥–ª—è —Ç–æ–≥–æ —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏—Ç—å  —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫—É –Ω–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–µ –ø–æ—Å–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∏–π—Ç–∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–º –∏–ª–∏ üìç–ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∞–Ω–æ–Ω—Å—ã    linkified –±–ª–∏–∂–∞–π—à–∏–π –∞–Ω–æ–Ω—Å    linkified –∏ –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥–µ –∑–∞—Ä–µ–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –ø–æ —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ –Ω–∏–∂–µ  Respect the cafeteria that host us by making any order moreover there is  discount for all menu till There is dress code in the bar you need to be dressed just fine  and everyone should have passport or any ID  Register please we'll send you film materials for discussion    linkified  Join our international chat LCampus.ru/chat
